name: Rigid Force Redux
overview: Rigid Force Redux breathes new life into the classic side-scrolling shooter genre with its lovingly hand-crafted 3D models, stunning environments, detailed effects and an electrifying Synthwave soundtrack. Arcade and Boss Rush Modes, leaderboards also available. Numerous upgradeable weapon systems, collect Energy Orbs to fill up your energy supply and eventually unleash an extremely powerful blast against your foes.
